column5: This was in our local paper.    It would have been front page if they used paint.
OMG!!!... what's next?... writing do-do in the snow in yellow???
I can't believe they printed that.
Now that's funny.  Hurray for boobies!
I love it. I'm amazed that made the paper...but sooo glad it did.  -R-
LOL You know there isn't a lot of crime in town, when that makes the paper  well they might be in the bible belt
Maybe it was a quiet cry to get a "HOOTERS" there.
Katrine is a small community about 50 km south of Powassan. Now.......where is Powassan? LOL
LOL...must have been a slow news day.  My brother out in Red Deer knows it's a slow news day when the local news' top story is something that happened in Toronto!
About,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,25 km north of Sunridge? LOL
That should make Jay Leno's bit about small town news
